import React, { useState } from 'react' import Navbar from '../../components/Navbar' import Footer from '../../components/Footer' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const ServicesView = () => { const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const service = { id: "4das354dasd", service: "Tailoring", price: 52.99, date: new Date() } return ( <>
Services

{message}

Edit

{service.service}

Price

KWD {service.price || "--"} %>

Date Entered

{service.date.toLocaleDateString('en-us', { month: 'long', year: 'numeric', day: 'numeric' }) || "--"}

) } export default ServicesView
